publish src/modules -v
run src/scripts/script.move --signers 0xA 0xB --args 6 7 --dry-run -v
view storage/0x0000000000000000000000000000000A/resources/0x00000000000000000000000000000002::Test::R.bcs
view storage/0x0000000000000000000000000000000B/resources/0x00000000000000000000000000000002::Test::R.bcs
run src/scripts/script.move --signers 0xA 0xB --args 6 7 -v
view storage/0x0000000000000000000000000000000A/resources/0x00000000000000000000000000000002::Test::R.bcs
view storage/0x0000000000000000000000000000000B/resources/0x00000000000000000000000000000002::Test::R.bcs
